story.text:
We used some other names earlier, like [[Viral Academy]]. The basic principles go back to the practices we developed as students applying multimedia to learning and training in medical school. We summarise the upgraded method here:

- [[Academy methodology]]

item.text:
We used some other names earlier, like [[Viral Academy]]. The basic principles go back to the practices we developed as students applying multimedia to learning and training in medical school. We summarise the upgraded method here:

- [[Academy methodology]]

DOT strict digraph
  
rankdir=LR

  node [style=filled fillcolor=red penwidth=3 color=black]
  HERE NODE

    node [style=filled fillcolor=yellow]
    WHERE /^>  __Parents:__/
      LINKS NODE -> HERE

    node [style=filled fillcolor=lightblue]
    WHERE /^> __Children:__/
      LINKS HERE -> NODE
        HERE NODE
          node [style=filled fillcolor=green]
          WHERE /^>  __Parents:__/
            LINKS NODE -> HERE
              HERE NODE
                node [style=filled fillcolor=green]
